verbs.description: Social media [V: has] exploded over a video that appears to show Pence copying Trump in a meeting .
[ARG1: Social media] has [V: exploded] [ARGM-CAU: over a video that appears to show Pence copying Trump in a meeting] .
Social media has exploded over [ARG1: a video that] [V: appears] [C-ARG1: to show Pence copying Trump in a meeting] .
Social media has exploded over a video [ARG0: that] appears to [V: show] [ARG1: Pence copying Trump in a meeting] .
Social media has exploded over a video that appears to show [ARG0: Pence] [V: copying] [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in a meeting] .
